author: Anonymous
title: 21 Super Mario Tattoos That Are Cool as Hell
text:
Tweet Posted: Sat, 3/4/2017 - 3:25pm by Daniel Dominguez 
I spent so many hours as a kid playing Super Mario Bros. , I knew it better than I knew my parents. And I admit I would totally get Mario Brother art , except one day I want to get a girlfriend. So Iâ€™m thinking that, while a poster of Mario stuff is childish, a tattoo is cool, right? It just expresses that I have a sense of whimsy and quirkiness. Here are some Super Mario tattoos that are really awesome. 1. Mar 20, 2016 at 10:54pm PDT 2. Oct 12, 2016 at 9:17am PDT 3. Jan 16, 2016 at 2:25am PST 4. Feb 28, 2017 at 10:42am PST 5. Feb 28, 2017 at 8:57am PST 6. Feb 22, 2017 at 7:50pm PST 7. Feb 22, 2017 at 2:08pm PST 8. Mar 3, 2017 at 4:11pm PST 9. Feb 21, 2017 at 3:18pm PST 10. Feb 21, 2017 at 9:35am PST 11. Feb 17, 2017 at 8:07pm PST 12. Feb 17, 2017 at 2:25am PST 13. Feb 15, 2017 at 5:49am PST 14. Feb 13, 2017 at 9:34am PST 15. Feb 13, 2017 at 10:54am PST 16. Feb 10, 2017 at 4:03pm PST 17. Feb 8, 2017 at 8:15am PST 18. Mar 1, 2017 at 2:48am PST 19. Jan 31, 2017 at 3:39pm PST 20. Apr 12, 2016 at 6:34pm PDT 21. Dec 16, 2016 at 12:36pm PST 
Does anyone have any Hammer Brother tattoos? Let us know on Twitter @Smosh !
